info.title: ClassMath API
info.description: ClassMath is a app that provide math learning materials and questions

get.summary: Get a grade or class by id

delete.summary: Delete a grade or class by id

patch.summary: Update a grade or class by id

get.summary: Get all tutorials from a grade

post.summary: Create a tutorial from a grade

get.summary: Get a tutorial by id from a grade

delete.summary: Delete a tutorial by id from a grade

patch.summary: Update a tutorial by id from a grade

get.summary: Get all quizzes from a tutorial

post.summary: Create a quiz from a tutorial

get.summary: Get a quiz by id from a tutorial

delete.summary: Delete a quiz by id from a tutorial

patch.summary: Update a quiz by id from a tutorial

post.summary: Create a question from a quiz

delete.summary: Delete a question by id from a quiz

patch.summary: Update a question by id from a quiz

get.summary: Get all quiz histories from a quiz

post.summary: Create a quiz history from a quiz

get.summary: get all quiz history from a current user
get all quiz history by id

delete.summary: Delete a quiz history by id
